name: Longest Hike
description:
Hike through challenging terrain. Avoid dangerous animals. Dodge tumbling boulders. Pick Flowers. Be a the most fashionable pixel person on the trail! With dangerous perils and stylish apparel, will you be able to escape from the hazards of the deadly mountainscape and go the distance? Use your wits and your reflexes to hike as far as you can.

NOTE: Currently supporting 16:9 aspect ratio only.
